name: py-pyyaml
description: PyYAML is a YAML parser and emitter for Python.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: libyaml
dependencies.description: A C library for parsing and emitting YAML.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-cython
dependencies.description: The Cython compiler for writing C extensions for the Python language.

dependent_to.name: py-haphpipe
dependent_to.description:
HAplotype and PHylodynamics pipeline for viral assembly, population
genetics, and phylodynamics.

dependent_to.name: py-pybtex
dependent_to.description: Pybtex is a BibTeX-compatible bibliography processor written in Python.

dependent_to.name: geopm
dependent_to.description:
GEOPM is an extensible power management framework targeting HPC. The
GEOPM package provides libgeopm, libgeopmpolicy and applications
geopmctl and geopmpolicy, as well as tools for postprocessing. GEOPM is
designed to be extended for new control algorithms and new hardware
power management features via its plugin infrastructure. Note: GEOPM
interfaces with hardware using Model Specific Registers (MSRs). For
propper usage make sure MSRs are made available directly or via the msr-
safe kernel module by your administrator.

dependent_to.name: py-ml-collections
dependent_to.description:
ML Collections is a library of Python collections designed for ML
usecases.

dependent_to.name: py-pyaml
dependent_to.description:
PyYAML-based python module to produce pretty and readable YAML-
serialized data.

dependent_to.name: py-hepdata-validator
dependent_to.description: Validation schema and code for HEPdata submissions.

dependent_to.name: py-fastai
dependent_to.description:
You can use fastai without any installation by using Google Colab. In
fact, every page of this documentation is also available as an
interactive notebook - click "Open in colab" at the top of any page to
open it (be sure to change the Colab runtime to "GPU" to have it run
fast!) See the fast.ai documentation on Using Colab for more
information.

dependent_to.name: rocblas
dependent_to.description: Radeon Open Compute BLAS library

dependent_to.name: flux-core
dependent_to.description: A next-generation resource manager (pre-alpha)

dependent_to.name: bigdft-chess
dependent_to.description:
BigDFT-CheSS: A module for performing Fermi Operator Expansions via
Chebyshev Polynomials.

dependent_to.name: py-datalad
dependent_to.description:
data distribution geared toward scientific datasets. DataLad makes data
management and data distribution more accessible. To do that, it stands
on the shoulders of Git and Git-annex to deliver a decentralized system
for data exchange. This includes automated ingestion of data from online
portals and exposing it in readily usable form as Git(-annex)
repositories, so-called datasets. The actual data storage and permission
management, however, remains with the original data providers.

dependent_to.name: gptune
dependent_to.description:
GPTune is an autotuning framework that relies on multitask and transfer
learnings to help solve the underlying black-box optimization problem
using Bayesian optimization methodologies.

dependent_to.name: bigdft-core
dependent_to.description:
BigDFT-core: the core components of BigDFT, an electronic structure
calculation based on Daubechies wavelets.

dependent_to.name: bigdft-spred
dependent_to.description:
BigDFT-spred: a library for structure prediction tools, that is compiled
on top of BigDFT routines.

dependent_to.name: py-yq
dependent_to.description: yq takes YAML input, converts it to JSON, and pipes it to jq

dependent_to.name: py-cinemasci
dependent_to.description: A set of python tools for reading, writing and viewing Cinema databases

dependent_to.name: podio
dependent_to.description:
PODIO, or plain-old-data I/O, is a C++ library to support the creation
and handling of data models in particle physics.

dependent_to.name: py-maestrowf
dependent_to.description:
A general purpose workflow conductor for running multi-step simulation
studies.

dependent_to.name: py-distributed
dependent_to.description: Distributed scheduler for Dask

dependent_to.name: py-bokeh
dependent_to.description: Statistical and novel interactive HTML plots for Python

dependent_to.name: py-rosinstall-generator
dependent_to.description: A tool for generating rosinstall files.

dependent_to.name: py-oslo-config
dependent_to.description:
The Oslo configuration API supports parsing command line arguments and
.ini style configuration files.

dependent_to.name: bigdft-futile
dependent_to.description:
BigDFT-futile: a library handling most common FORTRAN low-level
operations, like memory managment, profiling routines, I/O operations.
It also supports yaml output and parsing for fortran programs. It also
provides wrappers routines to MPI and linear algebra operations. This
library is intensively used in BigDFT packages.

dependent_to.name: py-multiqc
dependent_to.description:
MultiQC is a tool to aggregate bioinformatics results across many
samples into a single report. It is written in Python and contains
modules for a large number of common bioinformatics tools.

dependent_to.name: survey
dependent_to.description:
Survey is a high level performance tool product from Trenza, Inc. The
survey collector/analytics framework is a new generation, high level,
lightweight multiplatform Linux tool set that targets metric collection
for high level performance analysis of applications running on both
single node and on large scale platforms, including the Cray platforms.
The collector is designed to work on sequential, MPI, OpenMP, and hybrid
codes and directly leverages several interfaces available for tools
inside current MPI implementations including: MPICH, MVAPICH, MPT, and
OpenMPI. It also supports multiple architectures and has been tested on
machines based on Intel, AMD, ARM, and IBM P8/9 processors and
integrated GPUs. Survey is a licensed product with the source not openly
available. To access the survey source and build with spack please
contact: Trenza Inc. via: dmont@trenzasynergy.com or
jeg@trenzasynergy.com

dependent_to.name: py-asdf
dependent_to.description:
The Advanced Scientific Data Format (ASDF) is a next-generation
interchange format for scientific data. This package contains the Python
implementation of the ASDF Standard.

dependent_to.name: py-chalice
dependent_to.description: Python Serverless Microframework for AWS.

dependent_to.name: py-cekit
dependent_to.description:
CEKit is a Container image creation tool. CEKit helps to build container
images from image definition files with strong focus on modularity and
code reuse.

dependent_to.name: py-pomegranate
dependent_to.description: Fast, flexible and easy to use probabilistic modelling in Python.

dependent_to.name: py-jupytext
dependent_to.description: Jupyter Notebooks as Markdown Documents, Julia, Python or R scripts

dependent_to.name: aws-parallelcluster
dependent_to.description:
AWS ParallelCluster is an AWS supported Open Source cluster management
tool to deploy and manage HPC clusters in the AWS cloud.

dependent_to.name: py-abipy
dependent_to.description: Python package to automate ABINIT calculations and analyze the results.

dependent_to.name: py-watchdog
dependent_to.description: Python library and shell utilities to monitor filesystem events.

dependent_to.name: sirius
dependent_to.description: Domain specific library for electronic structure calculations

dependent_to.name: py-rospkg
dependent_to.description: Library for retrieving information about ROS packages and stacks.

dependent_to.name: py-pyrosar
dependent_to.description: A framework for large-scale SAR satellite data processing

dependent_to.name: miopen-tensile
dependent_to.description:
MIOpenTensile provides host-callable interfaces to Tensile library.
MIOpenTensile supports one programming model: HIP

dependent_to.name: py-wandb
dependent_to.description: A tool for visualizing and tracking your machine learning experiments.

dependent_to.name: py-keras
dependent_to.description:
Deep Learning library for Python. Convnets, recurrent neural networks,
and more. Runs on Theano or TensorFlow.

dependent_to.name: py-ray
dependent_to.description:
A system for parallel and distributed Python that unifies the ML
ecosystem.

dependent_to.name: py-pykwalify
dependent_to.description: Python lib/cli for JSON/YAML schema validation

dependent_to.name: py-clustershell
dependent_to.description:
Scalable cluster administration Python framework - Manage node sets node
groups and execute commands on cluster nodes in parallel.

dependent_to.name: py-workload-automation
dependent_to.description:
Workload Automation (WA) is a framework for executing workloads and
collecting measurements on Android and Linux devices.

dependent_to.name: py-niworkflows
dependent_to.description: Common workflows for MRI (anatomical, functional, diffusion, etc)

dependent_to.name: qgis

QGIS is a free and open-source cross-platform desktop geographic
information system application that supports viewing, editing, and
analysis of geospatial data.

dependent_to.name: py-datacube
dependent_to.description: An analysis environment for satellite and other earth observation data.

dependent_to.name: py-yamlreader

Yamlreader merges YAML data from a directory, a list of files or a file
glob.

dependent_to.name: bigdft-psolver
dependent_to.description:
BigDFT-Psolver: a flexible real-space Poisson Solver based on
Interpolating Scaling Functions. It constitutes a fundamental building
block of BigDFT code, and it can also be used separately and linked to
other codes.

dependent_to.name: py-libensemble
dependent_to.description: Library for managing ensemble-like collections of computations.

dependent_to.name: py-rosdistro
dependent_to.description: A tool to work with rosdistro files.

dependent_to.name: py-aspy-yaml
dependent_to.description: Some extensions to pyyaml.

dependent_to.name: py-python-benedict
dependent_to.description:
A dict subclass with keylist/keypath support, I/O shortcuts and many
utilities.

dependent_to.name: py-astropy
dependent_to.description:
The Astropy Project is a community effort to develop a single core
package for Astronomy in Python and foster interoperability between
Python astronomy packages.

dependent_to.name: py-vcstools
dependent_to.description: VCS/SCM source control library for svn, git, hg, and bzr.

dependent_to.name: py-hepdata-lib
dependent_to.description: Library for getting your data into HEPData

dependent_to.name: py-scikit-optimize
dependent_to.description:
Scikit-Optimize, or skopt, is a simple and efficient library to minimize
(very) expensive and noisy black-box functions. It implements several
methods for sequential model-based optimization. skopt aims to be
accessible and easy to use in many contexts. The library is built on top
of NumPy, SciPy and Scikit-Learn.

dependent_to.name: py-knack
dependent_to.description: A Command-Line Interface framework.

dependent_to.name: py-rosinstall
dependent_to.description: The installer for ROS.

dependent_to.name: edm4hep
dependent_to.description: Event data model of Key4hep.

dependent_to.name: py-phonopy
dependent_to.description:
Phonopy is an open source package for phonon calculations at harmonic
and quasi-harmonic levels.

dependent_to.name: py-damask
dependent_to.description: Pre- and post-processing tools for DAMASK

dependent_to.name: py-gemini
dependent_to.description:
GEMINI (GEnome MINIng) is a flexible framework for exploring genetic
variation in the context of the wealth of genome annotations available
for the human genome.

dependent_to.name: py-rosdep
dependent_to.description: rosdep package manager abstraction tool for ROS.

dependent_to.name: py-pymatgen
dependent_to.description:
Python Materials Genomics is a robust materials analysis code that
defines core object representations for structures and molecules with
support for many electronic structure codes. It is currently the core
analysis code powering the Materials Project.

dependent_to.name: py-pydeps
dependent_to.description: Python module dependency visualization.

dependent_to.name: py-vcrpy
dependent_to.description:
Automatically mock your HTTP interactions to simplify and speed up
testing.

dependent_to.name: py-omegaconf
dependent_to.description:
A hierarchical configuration system, with support for merging
configurations from multiple sources (YAML config files,
dataclasses/objects and CLI arguments) providing a consistent API
regardless of how the configuration was created.

dependent_to.name: py-ansible
dependent_to.description:
Ansible is a radically simple IT automation platform that makes your
applications and systems easier to deploy.

dependent_to.name: py-mikado
dependent_to.description:
Mikado is a lightweight Python3 pipeline whose purpose is to facilitate
the identification of expressed loci from RNA-Seq data * and to select
the best models in each locus.

dependent_to.name: py-wstool
dependent_to.description:
A tool for managing a workspace of multiple heterogenous SCM
repositories.

dependent_to.name: py-awkward
dependent_to.description: Manipulate JSON-like data with NumPy-like idioms.

dependent_to.name: awscli
dependent_to.description:
This package provides a unified command line interface to Amazon Web
Services

dependent_to.name: py-pytorch-lightning
dependent_to.description: PyTorch Lightning is the lightweight PyTorch wrapper for ML researchers.

dependent_to.name: reframe
dependent_to.description:
ReFrame is a framework for writing regression tests for HPC systems. The
goal of this framework is to abstract away the complexity of the
interactions with the system, separating the logic of a regression test
from the low-level details, which pertain to the system configuration
and setup. This allows users to write easily portable regression tests,
focusing only on the functionality.

dependent_to.name: py-pre-commit
dependent_to.description:
A framework for managing and maintaining multi-language pre-commit
hooks.

dependent_to.name: py-hpcbench
dependent_to.description: Define and run your benchmarks

dependent_to.name: py-rst2pdf
dependent_to.description:
Convert reStructured Text to PDF via ReportLab. The usual way of
creating PDF from reStructuredText is by going through LaTeX. This tool
provides an alternative by producing PDF directly using the ReportLab
library.

dependent_to.name: py-spatialist
dependent_to.description:
This package offers functionalities for user-friendly geo data
processing using GDAL and OGR.

dependent_to.name: py-bandit
dependent_to.description: Security oriented static analyser for python code.

dependent_to.name: py-owslib
dependent_to.description:
OWSLib is a Python package for client programming with Open Geospatial
Consortium (OGC) web service (hence OWS) interface standards, and their
related content models.

dependent_to.name: cosmoflow-benchmark
dependent_to.description:
This is a an implementation of the CosmoFlow 3D convolutional neural
network for benchmarking. It is written in TensorFlow with the Keras API
and uses Horovod for distributed training.

dependent_to.name: py-mmcv
dependent_to.description:
MMCV is a foundational python library for computer vision research and
supports many research projects in MMLAB, such as MMDetection and
MMAction.

dependent_to.name: py-vcstool
dependent_to.description:
vcstool enables batch commands on multiple different vcs repositories.
Currently it supports git, hg, svn and bzr.

dependent_to.name: nrm
dependent_to.description: Node Resource Manager

dependent_to.name: flux-sched
dependent_to.description: A scheduler for flux-core (pre-alpha)

dependent_to.name: py-hepdata-converter
dependent_to.description:
This Python 3 library provides support for converting Old HepData input
format (sample) to YAML as well as YAML to ROOT, YODA and CSV.

dependent_to.name: snakemake
dependent_to.description: Snakemake is an MIT-licensed workflow management system.

dependent_to.name: py-yacs
dependent_to.description:
YACS was created as a lightweight library to define and manage system
configurations, such as those commonly found in software designed for
scientific experimentation.

dependent_to.name: gnuradio
dependent_to.description:
GNU Radio is a free & open-source software development toolkit that
provides signal processing blocks to implement software radios. It can
be used with readily-available, low-cost external RF hardware to create
software-defined radios, or without hardware in a simulation-like
environment. It is widely used in hobbyist, academic, and commercial
environments to support both wireless communications research and real-
world radio systems.

dependent_to.name: py-kubernetes
dependent_to.description: Official Python client library for kubernetes.

dependent_to.name: py-hatchet
dependent_to.description:
Hatchet is a performance tool for analyzing hierarchical performance
data using a graph-indexed Pandas dataframe.

dependent_to.name: py-shroud
dependent_to.description: Create Fortran wrappers for a C++ library.

dependent_to.name: py-merlin
dependent_to.description: Merlin Workflow for HPC.

dependent_to.name: py-horovod
dependent_to.description:
Horovod is a distributed deep learning training framework for
TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, and Apache MXNet.

dependent_to.name: py-torch
dependent_to.description:
Tensors and Dynamic neural networks in Python with strong GPU
acceleration.

dependent_to.name: py-dask
dependent_to.description: Dask is a flexible parallel computing library for analytics.

dependent_to.name: timemory
dependent_to.description:
Modular profiling toolkit and suite of libraries and tools for
C/C++/Fortran/CUDA/Python

dependent_to.name: py-labours

dependent_to.name: py-coveralls
dependent_to.description: coveralls.io is a service for publishing your coverage stats online.
